author: {'steamid': '76561197997544805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1634663002}
review:
V3 одна из моих самых любимых визуальных новелл. Пропахший нафталином лейтмотив предыдущих игр - противостояние "надежды и отчаяния", которые по сути были просто переименованными "добром и злом", был выброшен в утиль и заменен на гораздо более интригующее столкновение "правды и лжи". Что лучше: горькая правда или сладкая ложь? Что есть правда, а что есть ложь? Подобные вопросы красной нитью проходят через все повествование V3.

И самое приятное - будет неожиданная концовка, которая вдруг превращает увлекательный детективный триллер в прекрасный образчик постмодернистской визуальной новеллы. Я высоко котирую месседж, что несет в себе концовка. В наше время [spoiler] бесконечной дойки франшиз[/spoiler] актуально как никогда.

Начинать лучше с первой части, так как V3 связана с двумя предыдущими играми. Тем же, кто ранее разочаровался в этой медиафраншизе, тоже стоит попробовать - третья часть выводит серию на качественно новый уровень и заканчивает на мажорной ноте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198379904566', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 447, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1712251317}

author: {'steamid': '76561199093874865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3658, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3658, 'last_played': 1708460792}
review:
Gioco stupendo, che mi ha incollato allo schermo per una cinquantina d'ore e che inaspettatamente addirittura supera i suoi predecessori, 

PRO:
-I processi: essi sono molto più ragionati rispetto ai primi due giochi, dove talvolta i moventi dei killer venivano un po' campati per aria.
-I personaggi: il cast presenta personaggi interessanti e misteriosi e che subiscono un ottimo sviluppo, facendo evolvere i rapporti interpersonali in modo naturale e godibile.
-L'ambience: il gioco, grazie alla sua musica azzeccata ed atmosfera intrigante, fornisce un perfetto ambiente per far prendere luogo omicidi contorti e misteriosi.
-Le emozioni: grazie a plot twist inaspettati, lore affascinante e tragici omicidi, il giocatore prova costantemente un mix di emozioni diverse, che culminano durante i processi e durante le rivelazioni più scioccanti.
-il finale: personalmente l'ho adorato e sono contento che la mia serie preferita abbia ricevuto una conclusione con la C maiuscola.

CONTRO:
-La longevità: sebbene la storia sia ricca ed invogli il giocatore a scoprire nuovi elementi, sono presenti vari punti morti, nei quali è possibile annoiarsi e perdere la voglia di giocare.
-Il mastermind: similmente ai primi due giochi, il mastermind agisce secondo ideali ambigui e piuttosto astratti.
-Il post-game: purtroppo a differenza degli altri giochi non è presente un porting di una light novel e le altre modalità sono molto scarne.

CONCLUSIONI:
Se avete già giocato gli altri giochi e visto le varie stagioni dell'anime, questo gioco è assolutamente un must play. Sebbene non aggiunga di fatto nulla all'arco narrativo della Hope's Peak Academy, esso è estremamente godibile e rappresenta un'ottima conclusione ad una serie così affascinante. 
Voto finale: 9,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561199416056641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1515, 'playtime_at_review': 4074, 'last_played': 1712165007}
review:
在我心里，V3这部从立意到手法推理到人物塑造，都是垃圾。制作组制作这部的时候，纯纯脑残。

弹丸论破系列我的排序，2>1>>>>>>>V3，当初2的结局确实惊艳到我了，放到今天也是不错的诡计。所以当初玩3的时候抱着很大期待，结果深深被恶心到了。

先说最讨厌的立意和故事，这是我见过最蠢的“打破第四堵墙”的操作了。打到结尾还差一点点，实在都不能坚持玩不去了。不想剧透，简单总结就是“请游戏制作组对玩家，有基本的尊重和感恩之心”
制作组仿佛想把每一个玩家塑造成“与众不同的玩家”，实际上我只觉得制作组在diss所有玩家。希望制作组知道，所有盈利游戏，都是为了赚玩家的钱而出现的，不是“玩家上赶着舔你，才有荣幸玩你的游戏”。是你自们用“自相残杀”的噱头吸引人来玩，不是玩家喜欢“自相残杀”才求你做游戏的。整个结尾我不会感觉自己是救世主，只感觉制作组脑残。

再聊聊人物塑造，这部人物塑造真的算是失败。除了航天员和刺客小姐这对小情侣还不错，其他人我真的很无所谓。
玩第一部和第二部时，我真的有很多舍不得的人。越往后玩，越怕下一个死的，是我舍不得的人。第一部千寻的AI没有了的时候，还掉了一点眼泪。十神和雾切响子能活到最后我也超级开心。第二部的七海也很可爱，而且狛枝的疯批真的让人印象深刻。
但玩V3时，说句冷血的话，当最后结局，我都无所谓谁死了，真一点舍不得都没有，有种他们死了就死了的感觉。完全没建立起任何情感联结。我甚至对男主角都没有一点喜欢，而第一案早早就死的人，就算当下遗憾，也已经不能给玩家很深刻情感连接了。

最后再聊逻辑和手法，如果说有些逻辑还过得去，很多的手法基本上你都会觉得完全只存在于虚构里，也并不精彩，总体让人失望。

早知道停留在第二季好了，非常后悔玩V3，希望能劝一个算一个。

author: {'steamid': '76561199430246589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 142, 'playtime_at_review': 2912, 'last_played': 1711733755}

author: {'steamid': '76561199164957956', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 958, 'playtime_at_review': 1262, 'last_played': 1712141216}
review:
无论前五章有多么优秀，第六章都值得我这个差评。
v3的结局等于说，作者主动放弃了他对于其作品的责任，而把一切转嫁给玩家。但凡对前两部作品还有一丝认真负责，哪怕是欣赏的态度，都不会做出这个结局。第六章前作角色之间的不断变换简直像是把玩家的头按在马桶里，还问你味道怎么样。
最后，小高和刚，你马似了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198831373601', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 4654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4654, 'last_played': 1709766475}
review:
Эта часть была невероятно долгожданной для меня, да и для ру комьюнити в целом. Перевода официального на японские новеллы можно априори не ждать, поэтому оставалось надеяться исключительно на перевод локальных мини групп.
И вот, недавно, этот момент настал. 
Игра отличная, это то, что я могу сказать сразу. В ней прекрасный геймплей с достаточно инновационными новыми фишками, для серии новел Данганронпа, да и в целом для жанра ВН.
По динамике эта часть куда лучше 2 части, где то на уровне 1. Разработчики, видимо, поняли, что действия в школе – это куда более атмосферно, нежели на открытом воздухе и вернулись к истокам. Возврат этот, субъективно, удачный.
Проблема этой части, на мой вкус, в излишней фантастической составляющей, если во второй части этого было ну прям чуть чуть и это мне уже не зашло, тут этого ещё больше, однако, это выглядит адекватнее 2 части, не смотря на всё вышесказанное.
Персонажи тут такие себе, от силы пару персонажей, которые меня деёствительно заинтересовали и вызвали интерес, остальные же ну просто никакие. Максимально. Скучнейшие. Личности. Хотя именно они должны вытягивать своей харизмой игру.
В остальном – это интересно. Сюжет, в отличии от второй части, умеет интриговать, динамичный и мне не хотелось спать в процессе. 
Однако, концовка, на мой взгляд, слитая. Да, масштабность тут прям нереально загнули, это выглядело прям супер, однако, анатгонист… Ну такое себе. Даже во второй части он был куда интереснее, хоть и выглядел как типичный сиквел, на даже то, что было там – выглядело круче. 
Но если подводить итоги, то эта часть отличная, я крайне рекомендую её, чего я не мог сделать на все сто со второй частью. Это интересная, динамичная и интригующая визуальная новела. Которая может смело вставать на второе место, среди трилогии Этой основной серии игр.

review:
Really enjoyed replaying this, definitely my favourite entry in the series - though I know the ending was somewhat divisive!

I know it says 'unsupported' for the Deck currently, but I played through in its entirety on Steam Deck (didn't 100% it, but I finished the game ay least). Beyond it crashing out if you try to skip cutscenes (including intro and credits), there were a few minor glitches. Otherwise a very smooth gaming experience! Appreciate future updates may make it less playable so don't trust me without checking - but noting that I took the risk and it worked for me!

review:
Je suis très satisfait de mes premières heures de jeux ! Le 1er procès étais... Woaw !

author: {'steamid': '76561198323882027', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1337, 'playtime_at_review': 1960, 'last_played': 1711812943}
review: 弹丸论破V3于2021年11月4日上架steam，跟第一部相差5年时间上架steam，对于该作品我是五味杂陈的，我是喜欢该作除了第三章的凶手以外的所有角色，尤其是赤松枫，她无限次让我看到了二代里面的七海千秋这位小天使。不过接下来要讲一下我个人游戏体验吧，首先是如果不设置键盘控制，你以手柄键去玩就会对游戏里边需要玩的小游戏键位感到十分困惑，然后就是剧情上，除了第六章以外文案啥的都是十分精彩的，人物的塑造人设的设定都很有趣，但是想好好体验该作的话请避开第六章游玩，因为你玩了第六章后就会知道编剧小高和刚怎么去恶心你，这V3极有可能是小高和刚对于弹丸论破系列的收官之作，他在第六章里彻底表现出来那种收官的倾向极大，可是他可能不太懂怎么给他写个好结尾吧，在第六章使劲地恶心玩家一遍。但是我还是希望你可以抛开许多人对第六章的不满，根据你自己的喜欢去游玩该作，不过呢没看过前作和游玩过的话可能会对他的一些设定需要一定时间去理解，最后就是希望你能爱上弹丸论破这个系列吧，还有噢，小高你马死了

author: {'steamid': '76561199151977333', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2386, 'last_played': 1641114633}
review:
LOVE THE DANGANRONPA SERIES!!! But that ending literally ruined it for me. I couldn't even finish the last few minutes of the game because of it.

I spend hours, days, weeks, and months loving this series. I only ever watched the gameplay of the first and second game, so I got really excited when my parents allowed me to play the third game. But I'm really disappointed of this game. I couldn't find myself to get attached to any of the characters aside from kaede and kokichi, so it already was a pretty meh game to me. 

I still managed to find love for the overall game, but the ending of "it's all a lie" was what really killed me, driving me to drop it. It made me feel as though all my time enjoying the game was really wasted, as if it didn't matter. I understand it was a bunch of pixels either way, but I want the characters to feel alive within THEIR world, but you're telling me that they're not? Such a huge turn off.

author: {'steamid': '76561199527855640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 319, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1712318118}
review:
[h1] 华而不实 [/h1]

从某种意义上来说，这是一部真正可以让我体验到16名受困高中生的心情的作品，翻译：
[h3] 如同被喂屎一般的无力感、愤怒感和惊慌感。 [/h3]
屎一样的操作系统以及键位布置，还有莫名其妙的相声剧情，就目前来看，远远达不到前两作的高度。
虽然UI和进入界面进行了巨大的修整，给人以亮眼的感觉，但只能说是好钢用在了刀背上，还不如优化一下移动手感，把那个该死的视角修正取消掉。

author: {'steamid': '76561199029879935', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4193, 'last_played': 1709069723}
review:
挂机一小时拉霸机（每半秒按一次鼠标右键）=1万币
整人难度鲑鱼一把（1分钟）=10万币
剩下俩，一个砸宝石我大脑过载玩不懂
一个撞人根本撞不到满分。还是鲑鱼简单，容易拿十倍。😋
安琪加入学生会的时候吞了我几次礼物，居然没好感剧情气死我了
什么，你说剧情啊？第一章小高直接把我学的物理当垃圾扔娄里
最后故事给我来个惊天反转，公平个鬼的垃圾自相残杀，还什么超高校级的模仿犯。差不多得了，不公平还模仿个寂寞，沙比。
失忆的黑白太郎……可爱🤤
隔壁的超侦探纯玩尬的不知道在搞什么飞机，小高你没事吃多几口药吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995001589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 428, 'playtime_at_review': 1377, 'last_played': 1711452048}
review:
The ending will make you regret spending time on that game...
I'm really not a fan of the "oh it's a lie in a lie in a lie in a lie" because it makes in the end the whole plot/interest you had for said plot meaningless.

Imagine if Agatha Christie wrote one of her famous mystery/crime novels, carefully laying pieces and hints all along to, in the end, tell you straight "ah lol there's no plot, it's a lie, or maybe I'm lying now saying it's a lie so you can't know what's true or not and what you were interested in, that is, the plot, doesn't exist hehe I'm so smart".

author: {'steamid': '76561199012368571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 431, 'playtime_at_review': 1729, 'last_played': 1711293154}
review:
伪证这一要素确实很有新意，使学级裁判线性推理基本面不变的情况下，通过埋里路线增添了可玩性，也很符合本作“谎言与真相“的主题
虽然第六章的评价见仁见智
[spoiler]想在立意上创新是好的，结尾彩蛋也暗示1、2代并不一定都是虚假的，参考最原分析白银自述的“模仿犯”身份，推理出希望峰学院和绝望残党可能实际存在。可见小高不算是背弃了曾经的作品。
但第六章实际游玩体验真的很差。尤其是白银cos的雾切、七海等曾经喜欢的角色说出一堆ooc台词，总给人一种被背叛的感觉。
只能说这一部分还有很大的进步空间，本来能做的更好吧[/spoiler]
以及经常出现键鼠失灵的问题，属实玩着难受。
但整体上还是保持了弹丸的水准，人物塑造可圈可点[spoiler] (枫妹真的哭死，论如何只通过一章剧情让玩家意难平一整部游戏) [/spoiler]，部分案件也能让人眼前一亮，整体上还是很值得一玩

review:
I don't think I've ever been so accurately and thoroughly called out by a video game before.  Bravo, Danganronpa V3, bravo.

(Also, the presentation is great, the characters are fun, the music is awesome, and the trial minigames have never been so well executed, along with some genuinely clever murders.  You really should play DR1 and 2 first, though.)

review:
V3给我最大的惊喜就是塑造出了一个王马小吉，除此之外整体都保持了前两部的水准，可惜的是经过前两部我没那么容易受到误导了，思考东西也更谨慎了，显得推理过程要比第二部容易了一些。
PS：小高加把劲写剧本，期待还能出续作！（结尾来看估计是出不了了）

author: {'steamid': '76561198037717255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12274, 'last_played': 1652536932}
review:
※個人の感想です
プレイ中の9割の時間が楽しい時間だったけど、最後だけで99点から2点くらいに下がったゲーム
総合して78点くらい

1と2がとても良かったと感じたのなら、最終章まで行ってプレイをやめることをオススメします。
最終章までは1と2も超える恐ろしく面白いゲームに仕上がってました。

review:
买v3全是冲着弹论这个系列去的
不是你tm一上来把枫妹弄死，我超你摩洛哥炒饼，赶紧把你那女性主角标签下了！
我的美兔说好出去后跟我约会的啊啊啊啊小高你木斯了
从switch移植到pc键位都不改是吗？价格又贵质量又烂。。。
做到第六章我也是挺懵的，当然结局是比不上之前两部的，也算不上太坏吧，就是这种结局能想出来也难绷，还反思上了？

author: {'steamid': '76561199533311854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3199, 'last_played': 1711021516}
review: 探案过程不错，但是最后一章很一般，我都不知道你想要在最后一章想输出什么无聊观点，幼稚又拖沓。一些小游戏也是无聊至极，我不如一直驳论伪证也不愿意搞那个小屁孩玩的脑内兜风。还确实真不如第一部人设掩盖动机的味道。如果我就是来看作案和探案过程的呢？煽情反思这些可以让观众自己展开嘛，怎么你制作组自己反思上了

author: {'steamid': '76561198971662612', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3400, 'last_played': 1693904892}

author: {'steamid': '76561198170090723', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 5876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5876, 'last_played': 1613337583}
review:
This game probably has one of the most controversial endings I've ever encountered...

That being said, it's 100% a game worth experiencing.

author: {'steamid': '76561199191444262', 'num_games_owned': 631, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2188, 'last_played': 1711006959}
review: 小游戏仙人，而且是很打乱推理节奏的无聊小游戏，推到一半开个几分钟车，推到一半来消消乐，犯案手段也大多都是一望而知的，而且推理过程是视频一样不能倒带而那些多余的机制比如用手柄玩弹幕射击和水果忍者更是让体验雪上加霜如果不小心失误自己没注意大概率就会穷举一遍浪费一堆时间，唯一亮点人物塑造也被垃圾到不能再垃圾的第六章全盘否定了，只能说我喜欢里面的人物但是我讨厌这游戏，第六章前我还觉得是不错的故事到揭穿主谋也还可以，然后观众席一出来就不对味了，开始在那发癫无病呻吟些希望啊绝望啊还tm又臭又长那个眼睛表子能不能tm别变了拿这种东西当彩蛋只会让我恶心，废话半天搞一个大家都喜欢自相残杀综艺就够扯淡了嘴炮一会就全都改变更扯淡了，没矛盾硬制造矛盾然后硬解决矛盾，整个看起来就是小学老是布置让大家写一个有关希望的议论文，然后肚子里没墨水就搁那硬编，鬼知道我听了多少希望绝望。完蛋揭穿主谋身份就可以了再玩纯折磨自己，代入进去的觉得自己被耍了，没代入的就这案件水平到底谁看到这种狗屎会觉得有意思有深度啊

review: 心目中不输二代的神作。本作每一案都挺绝望的，积压的虚无感在终章的反讽下更加强烈，虽然骂结局的人很多但最终章在演出效果和meta系的方面做的真的无可挑剔，反正特别对我胃口就是了

author: {'steamid': '76561198373416696', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2730, 'last_played': 1710927260}
review:
V3だけ積んでいたので漸くやって「ダンガンロンパ」という作品に終止符を打った。
気が付いたら発売から7年経っていた。。。
12絶対絶望少女アニメ2作、小説はダンガンロンパ/ゼロのみ読了。
終わり方は賛否両論あると思いますが、スタッフがコレで良いならコレが最善の作品の終わりでしょう。
私も「ダンガンロンパ」という作品の”終わり”を見れてよかったと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561197994925219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 2959, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 51, 'playtime_at_review': 2907, 'last_played': 1711400801}
review:
i finally got around to playing and finishing this game today, and i think it's probably my favorite of the mainline Danganronpa games. I think it has the best minigames and trial mechanics and the individual murders are challenging and fun to solve, but i didn't find them too overly convoluted.
At any rate, while I think I may like it the best, it is definitely best played AFTER playing the other two main games, and they are great as well!

author: {'steamid': '76561199151482884', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1532, 'last_played': 1710941601}
review:
剧情不用说，没能力做日常系推理，人物塑造也不如前两代，逻辑漏洞一堆。一代都有的结局分支，到这一代，明明能有很多分支但就是不做，处处都是恶意。
脑内兜风和理论武装手感烂的要死，偏偏最终章只有理论武装要打其他都是空过，就连这种方面也要恶心一下玩家。

author: {'steamid': '76561198401633414', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 2141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2141, 'last_played': 1703743829}
review: 白瞎了这么好的UI、配乐和人设，写出来的东西都是一坨，案件全是乍一看感觉很牛逼细想起来都是先射箭再画靶子。和你的母亲坐SpaceX上太空吧小高和刚。在V3口口声声结束弹丸，消费前作人物，还把锅甩给支持你的粉丝，结果又在新作里江郎才尽连看起来牛逼的案子都写不出来了，只能致敬画风致敬案件致敬粉血的你像个joker。

author: {'steamid': '76561198979405690', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1710260951}
review:
7/10
手打第一章，剩余流程纯云，没玩过前作
[hr][/hr]
第一印象：
小游戏仙人
水时长圣手
废话制造机
[hr][/hr]
剧情直到结尾才有所起色，说实话结尾的设计挺巧妙，但是考虑到系列没有新作以及小高出走，很难不怀疑这仅仅是一种为终结系列而量身定做的说辞，当然比起许多莫名其妙就没有下文的系列还是好一些的
人物动机逆天。在所有人中没有一个是真正为了逃离而杀人[spoiler] 失败的入间除外 [/spoiler]，童话故事都不敢这么写，囚徒困境直接给您解决了，什么圣人再世
案件构思尚可，但雕琢过重。[spoiler] 王马和百田 [/spoiler] 一案最佳，其它则中规中矩，不少情节有一种为巧妙而巧妙的感觉，很多时候失去内在的逻辑性，当然人性都可以抛弃，区区逻辑也不过尔尔了。[spoiler]以最精彩的王马和百田案为例，自始至终没有说明一开始王马囚禁百田的动机。我原本以为王马在动手之前就想出了计划，囚禁百田是预备行动之一，但剧情告诉我们他是在春川的行动后临时起意，这使得整个动机不再成立 [/spoiler]
[b] 废话太多，法庭推进太拖沓 [/b] 这是令我最无法忍受的一点。如果是逆转裁判那种程度，我还能替你洗一下说是为了诙谐幽默节目效果，但是30分钟能说清楚的事情非要用 无营养的扯皮、反复无常的发散、逆天小游戏 扩充到2小时，除了水时长想不出其它动机。逆转裁判可以称为喜剧法庭，枪弹辩驳只能说是菜市场法庭

author: {'steamid': '76561198307284473', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 112, 'playtime_at_review': 694, 'last_played': 1711876563}
review:
内容自体は賛否両論ありますが、熱のある悪い意見もそれだけこのゲームの思い入れという気がします。

しかし
私はキーマウでプレイしたのですが正直そこは最悪です。
キーマウでの評価は一気に下がります。キーマウで遊ぶ気なら買うのはやめましょう。
内容以前の問題です。正直PAD専用と言い切ってほしかった。
それかまともにキーマウの調整をしてほしい。
1.2ともによくはなかったですが3はまともにプレイできないレベルです。クリックが効かない。
これでアクション要素があるのは致命的です。これがまともなメーカーのやることか？
返品理由として成立すると思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198409912803', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 48, 'playtime_at_review': 2498, 'last_played': 1712315747}
review:
本文无剧透
刚刚打完v3的一周目，心情久久不能平静，故留此评论。
相较于精彩的1代和封神的2代，“v3是一部争议很大的作品”这一评论相信浏览评论区的各位都应该早已知晓。我也是在废寝忘食接连通关1，2代又补完动画后，浏览了观看v3的相关评论后，最终等打折购入了v3。抱着批判的心情，想要体验这一代的剧情。
个人感受：如果你十分喜爱12代的故事的话，那么第三代还是十分值得入手体验的。前五章还是一如既往的精彩吸引人：精彩的案件设计、一个又一个性格鲜活的角色、诸多对于前代梗和案件的致敬、还有穿插其中对于经典动漫的玩梗以及小高隔一段就爆的大活令游戏体验欲罢不能。尤其是第五章，在我看来是不逊色于2代5章的超级精彩章节。犹豫入不入手v3的玩家，我认为：光玩前五章就足以回本。
当然也不能不谈论争议极大的结局。我认为最后的结局和本作的主题有着很大的关系。不同于一代的希望与绝望、二代的未来与过去，本作，建立在真实与谎言之上。本作的故事中充斥着诸多的谎言，甚至为了接近真相，连主角在班级审判的时候都不得不依靠说谎的方式来推进。在最后站在主角的立场上，主角做出的选择我认为还是比较合理的。当然我也不得不承认小高在做最后一章的时候可能是真的不想出续作了，最后一章存在着可能让玩家不能接受的部分。而对于我来说，这是因为小高欠了大伙50部弹丸论破的原因，如果弹丸论破真的再出50部，可能理解主角行动和这个结局的人会更多。
总之，我还是认为不能仅仅因为v3结局的操作就简简单单将其归为粪作。喜欢12代的人，都请亲身体验v3的剧情并做出自己的评价。
（ps：中文与键鼠设置可以在steam齿轮的那个管理里改，游戏闪退是因为和中文输入法不适配，可以下一个纯英文输入法玩的时候切换就不会闪退了！）

author: {'steamid': '76561198117354920', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 135, 'playtime_at_review': 3558, 'last_played': 1711319650}
review:
(no spoilers)
Summary: Get it when its on sale, its not worth full price as its very buggy but still a great experience.
Note- Launch with control layout first so you can have PC controls displayed instead of default Xbox display.

The game was released after Danganronpa 1, 2, Despair sisters, and all the anime and movies but you dont need any of them to understand the plot. Still recommend playing first 2 games though as there are MAJOR spoilers for the plot of the first two games.

Review:
I'm having a hard time recommending it because the Class trial control scheme is swapped from 1 and 2, By default shows you non-pc Inputs, is horribly optimized causing it to lag and be Unresponsive during the most trivial of dialogue, and the "Shooter" vs "Danganronpa" control option is broken and doesnt change anything, instead of swapping the silencer and truth bullet controls back to traditional controls like its suppose to, it does literally nothing. During class trials inputs can even get eaten horrendously because of lag creating an extremely frustrating experience.

BUT,

The story is very well made and the game is still a lot of fun. I 100% cant look past how poorly put together it is but there is definetly a great game behind that mess. Also the poorly optimized issue seems to be relatively new since I played the game near release without steam years ago on a crappy pc and did not have the latency and lag issues.

review: I loved this game. I understand why some people hate the ending but I think that it was quite risky for them to opt for a narrative like that yet they still decided to do it despite what the general fanbase might think. Out of the three main Danganronpa games, this is the one with the best written and most interesting characters and most enjoyable mechanics. I can't say the same about the extra modes though, they are very boring and nobody asked for them, yet they are necessary to get the 100%, zzzz. Anyways, good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198313933769', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1710291565}
review: I really want to like this game, but even though I haven't gotten very far into it yet I have racked up more negative opinions about it than positive ones. If you're playing with a keyboard and mouse, half the time it won't even register your inputs. It also has a habit of randomly switching itself out of fullscreen and back to windowed mode, and the only way to fix this is to relaunch the game as, to my knowledge, there is no in-game setting to set it back to fullscreen. It took me about 4-5 hrs to get through the prologue and even longer to get to any part of the game that felt like it had any real narrative value or fun gameplay. Don't get me wrong, I like visual novel style games, but even so I still want to feel like the game I'm playing is actually a game and not just a vaguely interactive movie. I also think its very distasteful to have characters that are supposed to be high schoolers appear on screen in nothing but their underwear and having characters that are minors making what feels like near constant sexual jokes, or having those jokes made towards them. It just feels gross :/ I don't know if that is something that this franchise has done in all of their previous games as this is the first one I have purchased, and had I known that this would be such a big aspect of the game I never would have bought it. I absolutely love the concept of this game and it had been on my wishlist for awhile, but I don't know that I'll be able to bring myself to finish it. With all the bugs on PC it almost feels like a chore to play. I'm glad I bought this game on sale because in no way is it worth $40 and honestly even the sale price has left me feeling a little bit ripped off.

author: {'steamid': '76561199014507678', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2806, 'last_played': 1608925682}
review:
Danganronpa is such a complicated series to talk about because each game succeeds in incredibly different ways from one another, while slightly taking away from other parts. Case and point, I personally think this is the weakest installment in the main trilogy, but oh my FUCKING god those cases are good. If you liked the first two games there's a lot to get out of this one, just know that everything from its predecessors is cranked up to its logical extreme here (for better or for worse).

Also, about that ending: give it a chance, if it upsets you then think about what that tells you about the nature of endings like that, and how (and this is my personal opinion) it subverts the trope's usual pitfalls

author: {'steamid': '76561199065293109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1685, 'last_played': 1709967414}
review:
シリーズ１，２クリア済み感想

ネタバレ含みます
ダンロンシリーズの最後にふさわしい作品、続編が出たらこれが駄作になるので絶対に出してはならない
学級裁判のクオリティはシリーズで一番。ただ無駄に増えたミニゲームが微妙
キャラはダンロンらしく魅力的で、結構動いてくれるので面白かった

シナリオ
ラスト以外は面白い
研究室が解放されたキャラが重要人物になることが確定してるので結構絞り込めるのはなんとかしてほしかった
ラストにかけてのシナオリが特に賛否分かれる場所で、ザックリいうと「ダンロンを終わらせたい」という制作陣の思いが描写されている。これがあまりに強烈で自分は途中で冷めてしまった。しかし、冷めてしまったからこそあのエンディンクがあると考えると巧いなと言わざるを得ない

author: {'steamid': '76561199093224022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2294, 'last_played': 1709455127}
review:
so im like sitting here because i really spent 38 hours playing this game after not touching it since 2022. i think that this installment of the franchise, though it has like hella flaws, is pretty great and doesn't deserve the hate it gets. The cast of characters are just as interesting and fun as the previous games and the trials/executions rarely disappointed so i was pleased fr. this game also gave me rantaro amami and thats more than i could ask for. the only thing i have a sliver of a problem with is the ending...honestly i knew what they were trying to do but i feel like it probably couldve been done a little better, and thats basically my only issue with it. I think the ending gets more hate than it should, it was still a bomb game i feel..... its bold and unique and kodaka was definitely not afraid to get creative with it which i thoroughly enjoyed. unrelated but i also lowkey hate the way shuichi sounds, like okay bro we get it... what are you trying to achieve. it runs super well on the steamdeck btw, idk why steam tells you its not good on the deck because take it from me and my hours that it works great.
oh i also hated the ending of the first chapter like ugh. maybe not a fault of the developers or the story itself i just personally did not like the outcome.... i wont get into it bc spoilers but just know. its ugh. okay thx bye

author: {'steamid': '76561198064705993', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 2089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2089, 'last_played': 1710284083}
review:
Still early on but I don't like this version of the game as It doesn't properly display the PC controls what i mean is that there will be times during class trial where you have to mash "B" B =D so that's annoying. for future players: 
W - corresponds to Y.
A - corresponds to X.
S - corresponds to A.
D - corresponds to B.

Then there are the Cubs, they kill the tension for me, the scene is serious its building up the tension and these stupid cubs come and make stupid jokes annoying me, Really I could tolerate Monosuba but more of him is just not needed for me, I just finished the first Trial and it completely threw me for a loop, did not expect how it would turn out and Its beautiful. I loved the Danganronpa series so looking forward to seeing what else is happening.


Update 

After playing this game I don't know why its priced as it is, compared to the first 2 games? 

I have a mixed view of this game, I didn't enjoy the experience but there were Moments I liked, I love about the Danganrompa series is the mystery and finding comfort and intrigue with the characters you're stuck with some are complex and have ulterior motives while others are just so boring and repetitive: Tenko Chabashira repeating "degenerate males" quickly got old REAL FAST.  

One Thing I absolutely could of done without would be the Monosuba bears, they ranged from obnoxious to more obnoxious and killed it for me. so Gimmicky

I thought that the game play didn't really need all the game mode, like Psyche Taxi, you're just collecting orbs to create questions and driving to answers its not that great and for me killed the pace as I'm getting into it. 

Ending was not what I expected, but I didn't really care at that point just wanted to finish it up.

author: {'steamid': '76561199103468314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2933, 'playtime_at_review': 3924, 'last_played': 1712124078}
review:
教学一塌糊涂，按键都是Switch的，移植到PC这都不改吗

=======================
充满小高的恶趣味的游戏
谁能想到和安琪转子秘密子三个女同的恋爱反而是最甜的呢 
转子 香啊。。
秘密子 萌啊。。
安琪 小恶魔系啊 QAQ

官推赤松反而太正统了吧。。
有点无聊呢，女主不配有更多的剧情吗？也不是不会写恋爱剧情吧，CP感竟然不如王马

天海剧情，太现充了感觉，有点神经，让你喝水你也不高兴。真想化身白银把你就地正法。
白银剧情，中规中矩吧，本人坏女人爱好者，并不讨厌。剧情太少，玛奇玛平替。。 
王马剧情，在男生里应该算最好的的吧。王马也是本作人气最高的角色，立绘也比别人精致。
百田剧情，还好，最爱和你一起看黄书。
春川剧情：你要是不想和我谈恋爱就去和百田谈恋爱，从头到尾尬聊啊姐妹

星剧情：尬聊二号，我天天给你送衣服讨好你，竟然不如你之前养的猫，你的心里明明没有我还要我安慰你，我是什么很贱的人吗？
东条剧情：有点可爱，人物形象也有深入，喜欢。
权太剧情：性格和主线一模一样。我和小高都在浪费时间吧。
机望剧情：可爱正太。比主线可爱多了。
真宫寺剧情：美女，变态而性感的人类观察者，喜欢。
入间剧情：真的会有人讨厌入间美兔吗？？？

最原：嘿嘿，最原最可爱了~呜呜,我的最原~

=========

流程整体有点无聊，跑图跑到怀疑人生，谁能想到这个推理游戏最后是看手速和操作呢？

author: {'steamid': '76561198099644764', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 3351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3351, 'last_played': 1709253106}
review:
弹丸论破补完计划完成！算是给学生时代的回忆补了个票吧，弹丸论破跟逆转裁判系列都是个人比较喜欢的游戏，两种游戏风格不同，但确实让我感受到了推理游戏的乐趣，而且重新玩完三部弹丸论破我才发现，这个系列之所以牛逼，全都是因为有个爱搞事的反派，这点确实在其他游戏中很少见。V3的剧情怎么说呢，因为有前两部的铺垫在那了，谈不上特别惊艳，但总体上我感觉还行。
另外就是我拿steam duck玩的，没想到一个文字向游戏，1、2都支持掌机，3不支持。虽然能玩，但是问题一大堆，放不出视频，而且还存在秒退的情况，导致最终结局没看到，还是通过补视频看完的，体验着实不太好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198877606012', 'num_games_owned': 269, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 2289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2289, 'last_played': 1708974556}
review:
Adieu Académie du Pic de l'Espoir, bonjour Académie des Prodiges condamnés. Nous attaquons dès à présent un nouvel arc avec ce nouvel opus, qui va nous promettre encore un tas de rebondissement dans cette nouvelle Tuerie se déroulant à nouveau dans une école.

Si vous jouez à cet opus, c'est que vous avez sûrement déjà joué aux 2 opus précédents, vous savez déjà si le principe vous plait. Nouveaux personnages, nouveaux meurtre à résoudre lors de procès de classe, la formule de son côté ne change pas.

Nous retrouvons Monokuma cette fois-ci accompagnés de Monokumers, qui sont ces enfants.

Dans l'ensemble, le jeu tient les mêmes promesses que les précédents. Ce qui est incroyable, c'est qu'après 3 opus, ils sont quand même capable de se renouveler autant dans l'histoire que dans les principes.

Durant les procès de classe, vous aurez maintenant la possibilité de mentir pour faire avancer les débats. J'avais vraiment peur au début de ce principe mais il cela s'est finalement révélé plus simple que je ne le pensais à utiliser et j'ai même finis par l'apprécier.

Un autre nouveau type fais son apparition en procès : le clash d'opinion. Quand le groupe n'arrive pas à se mettre d'accord et s'oppose en 2 équipes, le mode s'enclenche avec pour principe de trouver la bonne phrase à réfuter selon les mots clés de l'opposant. Et franchement, j'ai énormément apprécié ce mini-jeu, j'étais limite déçu qu'il n'y ait pas pas beaucoup.

En point positif du jeu, nous avons la musique et les décors, qui reprennent bien l'idée des opus précédents. L'histoire arrive à nous faire tenir jusqu'au bout, bien qu'il faut lui laisser le temps de se développer en début de jeu.

L'idée de rajouter les Monokumers n'est pas mauvaise bien que je trouve que cela éclipse un peu trop Monokuma. Quand on se souvient de la relation de Monokuma/Monomi dans l'opus précédent, avoir notre ours préféré en retrait est un peu dommage.

Au début, je trouvais néanmoins qu'il lui manquait un charme sans vraiment savoir quoi, mais avec cette fin, je peux affirmer que le jeu est vraiment à la hauteur des précédents.

On abandonne ce côté Espoir affrontant le Désespoir pour en attaquer un autre, plutôt basé sur le Mensonge et la Vérité (avec le personnage de Kokichi Ôma qui ne fait que ça, ainsi que la possibilité de mentir durant les procès pour avancer).

Certains trouvent la fin décevante, au contraire je trouve que c'est une excellente conclusion à ce que cette histoire avait à nous offrir, mais je vous laisserai la découvrir plus en détail.

Au final, Danganronpa V3 arrive à égaler voire surpasser à certains moment ces grands frère, et en plus, il y a une traduction française ! (Bien que celle-ci soit approximative avec des fautes nous faisant un peu sortir du jeu).

3 excellents opus, c'est un sans faute pour moi, je vous dit bravo les développeurs ! 

16/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198234157976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 4254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2626, 'last_played': 1709421617}
review:
Le jeu est excellent et bien écrit comme ses prédécesseurs. Je le trouve même plus fort émotionnellement et il nous met mal dès le premier procès de classe.

Le gros point faible cependant : la traduction FR du jeu. C'est problématique qu'elle ne soit pas presque parfaite alors que c'est un jeu où CHAQUE détail à son importance. On regrette fortement la team Mirai qui a fait du boulot de bien meilleure qualité sur les deux jeux précédents alors qu'elle n'est même pas payé. C'est un petit point qui me met un peu en colère contre la team officielle qui a traduit le jeu, mais je ne vais pas en vouloir aux développeurs d'avoir enfin pensé à nous mettre Danganronpa V3 en français, bien au contraire !

author: {'steamid': '76561198383170701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3607, 'last_played': 1704581998}
review: Danganronpa V3 is a game that will make you feel feelings you did not know you had, as the character and story progression and development are unmatched. It goes from just another high school game to one of the best murder mysteries you will ever experience, as they take no time to introduce you to the horrors of the world around you. From the beginning of the game, they draw you in by introducing all of these lovable and unique characters that you can relate to in some shape or form. You will develop feelings for these characters, as they give you hope, but they destroy it just as fast as they give it to you, making it an emotional roller coaster experience. Danganronpa is a game that will change your view of the world once you're done with it and will leave a permanent mark on your life as that is how impactful this game is. However, despite its successes, the game is not without its faults, as sometimes it loses focus on whom a character was meant to be or what the overall meaning of the story or sacrifice was meant to be. Because of this characters you once loved will become your most hated ones, and you will curse at the devs for making it so, but that just goes to show how much they drew you in. To feel genuine hatred or love for a character is not something that comes easy, but Danganronpa V3 seems to do it effortlessly, as each character connects with the player. Adding on to its effect on the player, the story will make you feel as if the world is going to end if you do not see the end of a chapter as they throw interesting twists in unexpected places. In short, this game is not for the faint of heart. However, I can say with confidence that anyone can enjoy this game, flaws and all because you will find yourself sinking hundreds of hours into this game just to see the characters you love once more.

Вот разрабы действительно не придумали ничего лучше кроме как добавить больше гребанных медведей и увеличить хронометраж за счет тупых шуток? Мне жалко тратить свое время на этот калл, не рекомендую. Хорошо что я это говно за 700 рублей взял, а не за 2к на повышении цены.

author: {'steamid': '76561198930512213', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2638, 'last_played': 1703354366}
review:
While it is not my favorite in the series, it still had amazing cases (esp the first chapter) and a really wacky cast this time. 

The Monokubs weren't needed in my opinion, they were annoying at times but other than that, I loved being back in a school setting, loved the cases, and I loved the new mini games, they added a fresh feel to the class trial. [spoiler] I especially liked the "Lie" bullet, it was such a great twist that worked well. [/spoiler]

Yeah, the ending is unique, I think everyone has a different opinion on that but it is very..... danganronpa-y to say the least so just don't take things so seriously and I think it's enjoyable that way.

author: {'steamid': '76561199096708853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 1814, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1712, 'last_played': 1708794193}
review:
[h3]キャラ◎、展開◎→×、システム△[/h3]
『キャラ』と『予想外の展開(ラスト除く)』だけを楽しむものと割り切ればおススメです。ダンガンロンパらしい濃いキャラ、どんでん返しのストーリーは健在でした。特に序盤からの伏線は過去作最高だと思います。しかしプレイヤーの予想を裏切ることに注力して逆張りしすぎた結果、ゲームとしての完成度が下がりました。なんだあのオチは。。。

推理モノとしてはかなりテンポが悪いです。過去作よりも謎解き以外の要素に時間を多く取られました。長いアクションゲーム、長いギャグパート、一発ネタの繰り返しetc. 会話スキップも多用しました。

UIもわかりにくいです。過去作よりもオシャレ（ペルソナ風？）にしていますが、ゴチャゴチャしてるし鋭角図形が多いし、文字がグネグネし過ぎて読みにくい。フォントも読みにくい。

review: 这部作品的犯案手法真的很新颖，特别是第五章。但是，角色的塑造，乃是非常的幼稚。除开推理，以及推理附带的部分，其余的动机什、逻辑，都非常的幼稚。最后一章的完结想法，我是可以接受的，但是太便秘了，五分钟结束就够了，让我看那么久啰啰嗦嗦，反倒是厌烦。总得来说是值得这个时长的作品。最后，我喜欢入间美兔

review: 你说得对，但是这就是弹丸论破v3，高达200的售价，加了一些特效，搞了一个新环节，然后就没什么了，这就是200块。我是PC玩的，不说别的，就这个破暴力移植，我看半天看不懂键位怎么按（为什么？因为给我的键位提示是手柄的）你要是手柄就没什么问题，但是，它卖200！为什么我不去玩最好玩的弹丸论破2而要买你这个破游戏？

author: {'steamid': '76561197997036304', 'num_games_owned': 3192, 'num_reviews': 459, 'playtime_forever': 11380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11380, 'last_played': 1656123079}
review:
This is the last one of the series that I've made a review for as I've spent far too damn time on that stupid digging game! I'm the Goddamn Gaming Archaeologist, I should have been able to finish this game in one single go!

Anyway, my frustrations with a single mini-game aside, I have to say that this is the weakest of all the games so far, imo. Beyond certain story-reasons that would go into spoiler territory, there's a few choices in this game that I felt were annoying.

One of the most annoying bits they added to the court-room scenes is the whole lying to uncover the truth mechanic. It can also be used to skip through parts of discussion and get closer to finishing that section.

As typical the Ultimates are all quite interesting and have their own quirky personalities as before and as a fun call back to the other main games, there's quite a big interesting twist at the beginning that certainly creates a lot of surprises and like the previous games I often never saw the deaths or the ending coming, but in the case of this game, I feel that the ending came off as a little insulting and don't really see it as part of the series personally.

Many of the mini-games are a lot of fun and even the one I was complaining about, it fun but attempting to get the max score is next-to-impossible! Especially as the courtroom version you can smash up the small individual rocks where as the arcade version you can't and may even stop you from getting that final score.

It's still fun and I always like seeing more Monokuma and what kind of chaos that annoying bear can cook up as he claims the lives of my favourite characters! Though many in this I didn't feel that strongly for unlike the past two games where nearly ever death and betrayal hit me so hard.

Never give up hope!

author: {'steamid': '76561198425305547', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1734, 'last_played': 1708850995}

author: {'steamid': '76561198138049493', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 3180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3180, 'last_played': 1708316505}
review:
Spoilers for ending, read this is your cautious about playing this game as the ending will most likely change your opinion on this franchise entierly.

Lets put into perspective how the ending for this game plays out:
Imagine that you have just finished watching DragonBall, DragonBall Z and are up to the final moments in Dragon ball Super. Now at this point, you have spent a good while watching this show and have enjoyed the last 3 series a lot and are excited to watch the climax of Goku vs Jiren.

Goku and Jiren have been fighting for some while and the fight is reaching its end. Now, imagine if, Jiren turns around to Goku and says "Goku, your actually in DragonBall Super and are being animated by toei animation and are being watched by millions of people right now." That would be pretty odd, but imagine if he then said, "all of the enemies you have fought over the years are actually scripted pieces of fiction that dont exist in the real world, and you yourself have been given a plotline to follow." 

That would crush and invalidate everything that has happened in the show so far, from the very start.

That is how the ending for this game played out, and its so shit holy fuck how do you make an ending this bad

author: {'steamid': '76561198975158866', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1784, 'last_played': 1708276444}
review:
勾史中的勾史，答辩中的答辩。
作案手法看似精巧，实际上全是逻辑漏洞。
游戏名与其取《新枪弹辩驳v3》，不如取《最原终一 —— 从叛逆高中生到整个世界为他改变的超级侦探成长史》。
怀疑作者是用脚写了世界观的设定。可能是想靠虚与实的结合吸引玩家，但适得其反，看的我反胃+恶心。
游戏买的很后悔，这29h的单周目耗时也当白瞎了。
最后说一句不想好好做游戏可以不做，不必为了ip恶心之前玩过一二部的玩家。

author: {'steamid': '76561198390831470', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2697, 'last_played': 1708202089}
review: Danganronpa V3 is a fitting end to the whole killing game that Danganronpa 1 and 2 played around with. V3 feels like an incredible jump in both quality and style from Danganronpa 2. The design of the HUD and the 3D text in the class trials make this feel like the finest entry in the Danganronpa series. The story is also incredible, especially when it comes to the various plot points and class trials that happen. The first case especially is something special. V3 usually takes around ~45 hours to complete fully, but even then, there's still post-game content, making this game something you can pick up and still find enjoyment in after completion of the main story. Then again, Danganronpa S exists too, but I digress. Danganronpa V3, while being the final game of the Danganronpa franchise, serves to end the whole series on an interesting note, one I've never seen a series do before. I highly recommend Danganronpa V3, but if you want to enjoy the series in full, start with Danganronpa 1. I'm glad I got to experience something like this, and I do wish they made more, but I understand why they don't.

review: 首先作为第三部，为什么要把按键设置调的和前两部完全不同啊。其次你既然上了PC，想吃PC这口饭，那能不能照顾下键鼠玩家的感受，不能调按键你好歹按键指导里出个键鼠的按键啊，全是手柄按键我看个集贸啊。班级审判的时候交锋是最阴间的，强制你必须要手柄按键，鼠标的ESC键按得再快也不行。UI也是改的一坨，三国杀策划是不是学的你，不知道更新后改什么就改UI，虽然没做什么但改了UI显得自己似乎做了不少事。真的是被你这高贵的手柄官方恶心死了

author: {'steamid': '76561199466214732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4661, 'last_played': 1707711850}
review:
对于弹丸这个系列的三部都很推荐，建议在玩了一、二部之后再来玩第三部（看一、二部的番也可以），因为V3里面的一些彩蛋之类的，只有知道一、二部剧情才能懂。当然，不看的话也不影响观感。
       V3整部作品给我的感觉很奇妙，很多反转，在班级审判结束之前都无法确定事情的真相到底是什么，可能自己觉得一定不可能错的事情在后面也会被推翻，在游戏的后期，更是有许多的反转。玩到最后，各种恶搞，也很有意思！哈哈哈。
       弹丸这个系列我一直在玩，一部比一部精彩，有各种的惊喜不断地被呈现到我面前，玩起来挺开心的，如果有在犹豫要不要下手的，不要犹豫！！赶快买了它！！！你不会后悔的！！！
       最后，最原终一 王马小吉 狛枝凪斗 赤松枫 苗木诚 七海千秋 十神白夜 雾切响子 舞园沙耶香 神座出流 日向创赛高！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198031174508', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 2385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2385, 'last_played': 1707576260}
review:
DGV3:KH makes one ask the important questions like:

What the fuck is the age legal age of consent in Japan? [spoiler] (It's 16 which is higher than I was expecting, frankly) [/spoiler]
Why did that girl have an orgasm during a trial debate?
Are Danganronpa fans really so under-developed that they get offended by the ending? [spoiler] (Yes) [/spoiler]

Fun game.  It kind of went through the motions for the most part, which is fair, there isn't a whole lot more I reckon they could do with this format after 2 games.  I had a sneaking suspicion how the ending was gonna play out and I wasn't wrong.  I was cackling with laughter all the way through.  Amazing.

It doesn't do much more than what 1 and 2 already did beyond just telling a somewhat more batshit insane story, but it was great.  I enjoyed it.

idk about the side stuff.  I never really bother with it.

Wasn't as fond of the soundtrack in this compared to 1/2.

A couple of the characters were just really obnoxiously gross.  Was glad to see those ones knocked off.  Others were fine/cool.

It ran great on steamdeck.  Capped at 40fps for some extra battery life.

author: {'steamid': '76561199029606082', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2369, 'last_played': 1707341466}
review:
Так, если ты прошёл первые две части серии игры, то не обращай внимания на отрицательный отзыв, то иди беги играть - поверь, эмоции подарит, отвечаю. При этом всё осталось так же - хорошая музыка, сюжет, персонажи, суды и т.д. - только управление в начале будет не привычно - я не знаю, почему разработчики поменяли кнопки некоторые, вотъ. Так что бегом играть.  

[h1]НУ А ТЕПЕРЬ ОБЗОР ДЛЯ ТЕХ КТО ПРОШЁЛ ИГРУ[/h1]
[spoiler]
Иди играй, я же сказал.


Так то это мои мысли для тех, кто игру прошёл, я предупредил.

И так, Dangaronpa V3 это типичная ронпа на первый взгляд с её минусами и плюсами. Но на первый взгляд. После же прохождение мы имеем проблемы, которые говорят, что Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony эта та игра, которая одновременно пытается и удивлять всё больше и больше, но в тоже время не дотягивает до максимума - всегда есть то, что портит полноценную картину - и это, например, финальный твист. И вот я попытаюсь объяснить почему Dangaronpa V3 заслужила отрицательный отзыв. 

Начну с того, что финальный твист - "это не просто смело, это п#здец как смело" Да, это перечёркивает все предыдущие части, но если авторы так решили, то это очень круто как по мне(хотя я не одобряю этого) Но проблема в том, что это сделано не уверено - игра всё ровно даёт шанс, надежду на то, что всё неоднозначно для игрока и всё может быть не так как сказано - опять же, не исключаем вариант, что они в VR сидят как во второй части или вообще другая вселенная... Ну вот, и ладно бы перечеркнули, но вместо шизы первых двух частей, которая работает в рамках 1-2 части нам оставили вселенную "V3" с кучей вопросов на которых нет ответов, так ещё и более забористую, из-за чего возникает вопрос - это того стоило?

И поговорим про главное достоинство игровой серии - персонажи. В серии Danganronpa персонажи это несомненный плюс, потому что они сделаны так, чтобы за ними было интересно наблюдать, слушать, и неожиданно, даже понимать и т.д. И Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony не исключение - за одним но - лицо отвечающие за главного злодея никакое. Джунко Эношима из первый частей это база среди игровых злодеев - она офигенна в этом плане, но в третьей части такого персонажа по атмосфере, крутости и т.п. - нет. Просто чувство пофигизма что-ли к отрицательному персонажу что-ли.. Да, я понимаю, что он не должен быть литарри Джункой, но быть крутым в Danganronpa ведь обязан же, но в новелле это не так. Он скучен. И даже конец самого персонажа ничто иначе как случайность, да и выглядит дешево... И это тоже проблема этой части, ибо злодей - просто неинтересен. 

И в итоге мы получаем, что Danganronpa V3 сложно оценить правильно - если оценивать как самостоятельный проект, то игра несомненно является хорошим продуктом, потому что имеет те же плюсы и минусы, что предыдущие игры, но в контексте того, что это третья составляющая игровой серии Danganronpa, то это самая худшая часть из-за того, что она меньше всего похоже качественно на Danganronpa. И поэтому я поставил отрицательный отзыв по той причине, что игра оставляет противоречивые чувства - в ней одновременно есть как и хорошие, так и плохие моменты. Даже в рамках концовки, которая поменяла всё.[/spoiler]

review:
经常闪退，体验感很差
人物的塑造和案件的设计都很棒，尤其是第一章和第五章中的反转，在最开始的时候很容易犯先入为主的错误，中途靠着提示一步步推出真相很有成就感，大多数角色塑造的也很饱满，每个人的行为也符合角色的性格，不会出现逻辑性的错误，也能看到角色们的成长，案件的编排算是三部里的巅峰
但第六章和前五章的水平差的太远，前面没有一点铺垫显得很突兀，虽然想要借角色来打破第四面墙，但情节的构造上很糟，给人一种莫名其妙的感觉

author: {'steamid': '76561199214053493', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 3571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3571, 'last_played': 1706745776}
review:
走路时视角一颠一颠的不舒服
部分玩家津津乐道的[spoiler]meta[/spoiler]元素，其实在本作中表现得很平庸，对于初次接触该题材的玩家来说也许觉得很新鲜，但对接触过的玩家来说已经没意思了，不值得专门拿一章的篇幅去讨论甚至作为整部游戏的“真相”
本作贯彻了男人的浪漫，有男性偷看女性换衣服的情节
人物塑造比较失败，不讨喜。某位同学去世时我甚至在想“终于死了，太好了”。到了中后期，同学们基本都是拖后腿的，令人心生反感。以至于红鲑团（类似前作爱岛模式）我只勉强选出六位我愿意满亲密度的同学。别的同学不是懒得刷，而是压根不想跟这些人搞好关系= =b

author: {'steamid': '76561198344830852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1655, 'last_played': 1707227339}

author: {'steamid': '76561198956735120', 'num_games_owned': 290, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2106, 'last_played': 1707144350}
review:
玩过弹丸论破2，这里我建议别玩v3了云通关吧，本作雷区槽点略多，如果头铁另说。
本作加入了大量官方吐槽以及搞笑部分，但大部分让人难以接受，甚至让人觉得故意拉长时间，但快进又怕不小心错过剧情。场景的转换追加了类似漫画分镜等转场移动动画，刚开始可能觉得嗨挺新颖的，后面的话觉得费时间，特别是不能传送的时候会特别讨厌这个动画。没用的小游戏越加越多，还追加了一些言弹新系统，让原本的乐趣少了很多，什么赛车，消方块，言刃其实都可以删掉，反而会好很多。至于技能让人无法吐槽，通关基本没买过技能直接暂停都没用几次就打过去了。
最让人蛋疼的是都用pc玩了，你就不能改下按键的显示吗，最后那个做的音游一样的玩法不用手柄的，很难按准方向键，特别是最后的难度设计的那么快的，YBAX四个按的时候还得思考哪个是上下左右根本习惯不来。
如果前面看完你还想玩，这里建议你第一章或者第五章收手，如果用喝可乐来比喻前面五章，第一章就是那值2.5的第一口，后四章当个乐子。最后第六章就是屎，又长又臭。如果你玩了最后一章，估计跟我一样想把这70块的游戏退款，然后把游戏公司扬了

author: {'steamid': '76561199144244182', 'num_games_owned': 185, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2921, 'last_played': 1707294692}
review:
从弹丸3开始就是纯粹恶心人了，天天除了搞一堆下流段子和脏话不会以为自己的思想挺好挺有价值吧。
结局为了反转而反转，搞一堆谎言的东西，你想让谁猜呢。
玩完是惊讶到了都给惊吓了。
感觉第六章后半部分整个游戏都像小丑一样，自己做的角色一点感情都没有，死里整，最后搞一堆热血嘴遁是吧。
你怎么不写你们全体工作室都是被上司压榨的赚钱工具呢，搞笑吧，明明可以像2一样给与所有人一个不算完美的好结局，非要搞一个标新立异的的玩意，你以为是机器人玩游戏是吧，刀到死否定一切，搞得乱七八糟的最后给那么一个都算不上希望的垃圾结局，你搞一个全员活下来了又咋样。。

还有这垃圾移植，经常按键不灵，一点通关后刷成就的心情都没有了。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198016164777', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 2513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2488, 'last_played': 1706991302}
review:
When talking about this game with people, I've heard people say it's not as good as the original entries and I've heard other people say it's the best game in the series. Now that I've finished this game, I understand why there is this divide in opinion and I understand both sides. 

On the surface level, it's the same Danganronpa that you see with 1 and 2, but when you actually dive into the game, it's differences become much more apparent. Whilst 1 and 2 had their differences in how the trials worked, they are much more comparable to each other than the changes V3 made. I think it's better to let these differences catch you off-guard so I won't go into too much detail but to give a non-specific example (although I will still mark it as a spoiler in case you really want it to be complete surprise), [spoiler]you usually will have to lie and spread misinformation at some point in the trials in order to reach the truth.[/spoiler] This is just one example of how the trials are different, and it's not the only thing that's different in this game. Without revealing too much, the story at first feels familiar, but you slowly begin to realize that things are not as they seem. The ending especially is not something you would expect from Danganronpa or many other games in general. This game also has a much more polished feel compared to the other games, though that's most likely both from the advancements in tech and Spike Chunsoft themselves being a bigger company. There are more examples but to list them all out would just make this review even longer than it needs to be, but just know this game is different in a lot of ways.

Personally, the one thing I always loved about Danganronpa was how unique of a video game it was, and therefore I've always liked it when the game changes things up. Because of that, I feel that Danganronpa V3 is a very unique and enjoyable take on Danganronpa as a whole. There are some reviewers that will tell you the game is only good up to Chapter 4 and after that it sucks because they don't like the ending, but honestly I feel like if the ending were something else, I would probably give this game a lower score.

Overall, an amazingly unique game from a franchise known for its amazingly unique games. 10/10

(P.S. Clair de Lune was an insanely based song choice for the scenes it is in.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198064464406', 'num_games_owned': 345, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1757, 'last_played': 1706826403}
review:
Intentionally writing a shit ending as a form of meta-commentary doesn't make what you wrote any less shit.

Danganronpa 3 is a noticeable step down from the previous two games in the series, pretty much because of the ending. I won't go into any details to avoid spoilers for the rest of the game (which is fine, and on par with the rest of the series), but the hope you get from the main body of the game will be undone from the despair you get from the ending. 

Also the writers seem to have forgotten that dirty jokes work best when used sparingly, something they clearly knew when writing the first two games. At points the dialogue sounds like it was written by a bunch of ten year-olds who have just discovered urban dictionary.

review: 这一作获取黑白熊币非常容易，到后期币完全可以刷到上限。在正剧结束后似乎没有扭蛋机可用，所以攒的黑白熊币全部浪费了。游戏厅的点数倒是还有用，如果币很多可以换成游戏厅点数。老实说结局个人感觉没有前两部好，给我一种很粗糙很仓促的感受。

author: {'steamid': '76561198387472051', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1956, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1833, 'last_played': 1706624244}
review:
作为一部弹丸论破V3很优秀
作为一个新人入坑作品确实很优秀
但是作为系列老粉
从一代玩到现在
一笔一笔谱写的暗线，各种坑
因为前作的优秀所随之而来的期待
结果在这一作被一脚踩碎
本想着有超大的世界观展开
结果你说
全都是因为是玩家想看
所以才逼迫他们自相残杀的
我只能说小高我超死你的马

author: {'steamid': '76561198319180076', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1744, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1659, 'last_played': 1706598421}
review:
从结尾第六章可以看出小高确实不太想干了，
有种“cnm，终于快写完了随便整个结尾意思意思”的敷衍。
但是小高还是极其有求生欲地让男主以“谎言”的角度和同伴猜测白银话的真假，
并留下了悬念（也许是方便日后项目重启恰烂钱）。
虽然我在游玩体验（UI、学园审判环节操作、演出效果）
和前五章的剧情体验上有了较大的满足感，
但是鉴于第六章一整章被小高贴脸输出并喂了一嘴答辩，
我还是给个差评，让小高也感受下玩家在游玩时的绝望。

author: {'steamid': '76561198427016318', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2542, 'last_played': 1706679651}
review:
玩一二代外传时已经是两年前，之前三代只玩了第一章，现在才重新捡回来玩。
几个案件有优秀之处也有一定缺陷，中间穿插的梗令人忍俊不禁。
角色塑造个人认为比前两作稍差，前作有很多角色直到现在我也还有很深的印象，这一作估计过几周我能记得的也就五六个人了。
关于结局，在游玩的过程中已经稍微能够察觉到了。而且以“谎言”为主题并留下了悬念估计还是存着写续集的后路，以后用来恰烂钱也不是不可能。
最可惜的是女二喜欢男二，真的蛮吃女二这一套。
综合评分能给到7/10，有缺点但不失为一款良作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198338600926', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 2153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2153, 'last_played': 1706364872}
review: 整体上的案件、推理、悬念、反转和世界观设计还是很不错的。即使在看了弹丸论破1，2如此多的精彩故事之后，本作的很多剧情走向仍然出乎了我的预料。极具争议的第六章可以说是神来之笔，对着玩家贴脸输出，而且不太好反驳。但它给了玩家一个思考和认识自身的机会，我觉得值得一个高分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198260232247', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1604293488}
review:
首先笔记本电脑玩不了一直闪退，调到最低画质也不行，明明很多比这个精致的游戏都能正常玩，应该不是我的问题，优化这块确实做的不好

很久之前就在b站云完了，当时被结局气晕了没写评价，最近在重温弹丸2，再次深深地感受到这一作的差劲，怒上心头来打差评
我对弹丸论破V3的不满是多方面的。最不满意的就是角色塑造，和2差的不是一星半点。玩弹丸论破2我能感觉到大家都是好人，虽然有些缺点但我都很喜欢，也能感觉到大家齐心合力共度难关的那种羁绊，有些很讨厌的角色，也有看到他们的成长。V3有几个人我真的是从头讨厌到尾，巴不得他们赶紧死，成长虽然有但不多，羁绊感更是和2差得远。可以说2里讨我喜欢的角色都是“复杂的好人”，3里讨我喜欢的角色都是“单纯的笨蛋”，显然前者要有魅力的多。
除此之外，这一作案件质量拉跨（第五章除外），作案动机抽象，结局更是重量级，除了对玩家的恶意以外我想不到任何形容词。
怨气发泄完了，回头看看其实这一作的优点还是有不少的，无论是玩法还是美术、音乐，它都是原汁原味的“弹丸论破”，霓虹风格的UI我相当喜欢，伪证机制也十分有趣，的确能让对1代2代意犹未尽的粉丝过把瘾。但这些优点实在无法弥补令人失望的剧情。

author: {'steamid': '76561199060761598', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2197, 'last_played': 1707397341}
review: Игра мне понравилась. Отличное продолжение франшизы и отличный конец этой франшизы конечно. Концовка дала понять [spoiler] что "убийственных игр" мы больше не получим [/spoiler], хотя это только мои доводы)). Однако игра показала себя с отличной стороны в плане сюжета и персонажей, также геймплей очень удобный. Вообщем более сказать не могу отличная ронпа, хорошая ронпа.

review:
Don't play it if you don't own a controller. I don't know how they managed to fuck up a Visual Novel port, but the game controls horribly on keyboard and mouse. Not only does the game not give you any kbm prompts, the controls are also extremely unresponsive and render certain minigames extremely difficult or downright impossible

Other than that, hey it's danganronpa if you got to the third game you already know if you're gonna enjoy this brand of weird or not

author: {'steamid': '76561198241782942', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2475, 'last_played': 1705923215}
review:
糞作。
咬著牙從1玩到3，除了殺人手段的解密稍微精彩一點，世界觀的設定、人物的塑造、行動模式、文本水平全都是一坨史。一個bgm從一代用到3代，錢全賺糞坑裏了是吧？你稍微變奏一下我都不至於被這麽惡心。每代必出一個癡女/漢人設，字裏行間都是魅男的黃色廢料，還有腦内兜風路站牌時不時放一兩個女角色所謂的福利圖，真是一場盛大的辱女盛宴。心理描寫跟小學生流水賬一樣，光是忐忑不安就能寫七八頁廢話，你想用沉浸式對話塑造主角的心理變化也不必每一次都花上七八頁的口水賬來描述吧？次次都來，次次都一樣，成長屁都沒有，看了真煩躁。還有難用到爆的行動脚本，在解密系統裏用小學生文筆玩文字游戲，應該給玩完糞作的我精神賠償費
劇情吐槽：從一代起就開始編莫名其妙漏洞百出的世界背景，我抱著看作者到底要怎麽圓才硬著頭皮玩完了3。結果倒好，直接不圓了，玩家成惡人了！哈哈。我真的會假裝玩sm把你往死裏打.JPG。懶得駡了，玩完這系列的我才應該罵
總之誰玩誰傻屌，誰吹誰弱智

author: {'steamid': '76561198974455848', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3494, 'last_played': 1704475717}
review: 赤松枫跟我谈恋爱吧，我大部分时间都在打游戏,留给你出轨的时间很多。而且我笨笨的，抓不到小三，外加经常熬夜通宵，活不长的，求求你了

author: {'steamid': '76561199182838892', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2588, 'last_played': 1706675549}
review:
The ending to this game is controversial, to say the least. Personally, I thought the ending was good. I don't think it was perfect by any means and there were certain reveals in it that I was a little mixed about, but overall I had no quarrels with the ending. I understand peoples issues with it, and I think most are valid, but despite that, I still enjoyed it [spoiler](maybe that’s because, the way I see it, the ending encompasses Danganronpa. A cruel reality and a true sense of despair as we learn that all that we’ve been through in the other games never happened, and that all we thought we knew was false. That despair is the epitome of Dangonronpa, and this time, we’re the victim. Also for it to be revealed in such a brazen and startling way, that catches even the player off gaurd as it’s something they never expected, that shock is the feeling of Danganronpa, anyways, sorta rambled a bit)[/spoiler].  However, do not discount the game just because of the higher amount of negative backlash it has received. Even if the ending isn't too your liking, the rest of the game is still just as impeccable as any other Danganronpa game and the cast is just as likeable. Every character this story threw at me was amazing and I loved each one, every case the game created was gripping and engaging, and the game play is easily the best out of any game. Personally, I love this game just as much as the other two, each game in the series has its own merits and flaws, so its impossible for me to rank them. 

TLDR: Despite what you may have heard, still give this game a try. I doubt you'll regret it. Also it has gambling.

author: {'steamid': '76561198821571650', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2605, 'last_played': 1710550782}
review:
Шедевральная игра, как в целом и все остальные части, да и вообще вся эта вселенная ронпы. Даже не жалко потраченных денег. 
 Первый суд вообще просто нечто. Заставил уйти в себя на некоторое время. Давненько подобного не испытывал. А все остальные суды просто отличные. В основном простоватые. Как писал один из авторов комментариев: "уже по уликам можно догадаться о основных событиях". Так оно и есть. Это огорчает немного, но так или иначе всегда были какие-то изначально непонятные моменты для меня.
 Концовка спорная. Честно говоря, хотелось бы чего-то иного. Но и этот конец делает историю более менее завершенной. Если бы концовка была бы такой, какой хотелось бы мне, то это однозначно была бы лучшая игра для меня. Но а так просто крутая и интересная новелла на 9,5/10 скрытых Монокум.

Чуть не забыл упомянуть ужасное залипание клавиш. Не знаю, может подобное не у всех, но у меня было. В целом на геймплей они почти не влияют. Просто раздражают. Сложно лишь было в конце 6 суда. Но кому-то это может доставить проблемы и раньше. Так что вот)

Всем рекомендую! Хотя бы пиратку, но пройти надо) Те, кто не шарит о мире ронпы, многое теряют 0.0

author: {'steamid': '76561199157170668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3344, 'last_played': 1705739766}
review:
各種惡趣味設定仍然不缺，但這次打破了很多以往認知上的設定，只能說開場沒多久就把我腦迴路震斷了

凶殺案的手法各有不同，但最後那件兇殺案的設定跟巧思真的讓我非常佩服，真的很妙，用在推理小說或戲劇也是非常出彩的設定

劇情有很多我情感主觀上不喜歡，但客觀上來說更添戲劇張力的安排，只能說見仁見智

劇情真的是稍嫌拖沓，雖然這個遊戲的對話是重點之一，但太多灌水對話真的很拖時長

明明沒卡關一路很順的玩過去，玩了五個小時但回顧玩了甚麼，怎麼好像劇情進度跑的也不是很多阿笑死

結局蠻有趣的，但結局劇情那邊真的是拖戲拖到炸裂，會玩到有點煩躁ww

可是整體來說還是超級推薦真的很有趣

review: These games are soooo much fun. It's actually one of my favorites. Between this series and persona. I've bought all the manga, watched all the anime, even go as junko for anime conventions. These games are amazing and I'm really hoping they continue,  maybe a full reboot or prequels. I don't care but we need more. Start a kickstarter if needed. Three is not enough. The story is amazing, game play is fun, mysterious are always fun to play along with. Im even itching to play them all again but 9f course it's not as much fun the second time around, you know everything by then. You must buy all three. 1 and 3 are tied for my favorites but it's all very good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198971366214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2641, 'last_played': 1707119595}
review:
1、v3跟12相比确实玩法和操作上是增加了很多的，如果单看操作玩法的话确实是一部好作品。
2、但是内容我不敢恭维，前四章我只能说很无聊很无聊，跟前两作比差太多了。这部我搞不懂为什么，总是搞那种凶手计划的完美计划必须有点失误，离谱。
3、最惊艳的只有昨天玩的第五章，然后我满怀激动的把第六章留着今天打，准备认真地对待（我以为会很精彩）的结局，结果没想到给我喂了一大坨，哈哈，无语了。第六章刚开始玩到[spoiler] 赤松枫不是凶手，是主谋嫁祸的时候 [/spoiler]，我还特别激动，以为能有跟之前两代一样的惊喜结局，然后刚推完她的故事，转头就开始喂粑粑，哈哈，受不了一点，我直接无语了。
4、我搞不懂，我真的搞不懂，搞这种结局桥段不会以为很上价值把？把玩家当傻子看？[spoiler] 玩个游戏谁不知道是虚拟的？ [/spoiler]需要搞这种无聊的桥段吗？把自己前几代的设定的世界观全部推翻，笑死。[spoiler] 就跟斗破苍穹最后结局说其实修真世界是不存在的，都是读者想要这样的世界所以创造出来的，你们都是普通人类修炼什么啊，全是主谋设定的一样，哈哈，笑嘻了。[/spoiler]把自己游戏的世界观打破还谈什么游戏？嘻嘻。[spoiler] 前面自己说这个不管是黑白熊还是主谋，在自相残杀的游戏里必须讲规则，然后第六章又说因为是虚构的所以不用讲，嘻嘻，那春川和机望全砂了多好，省的给玩家喂石。[/spoiler][spoiler] 最后又说枪弹辩驳的世界可能是真的，哈哈，又给我为了依托，我真笑嘻了。 [/spoiler]
5、本来玩完前四章我跟我朋友说，v3虽然剧情差点，算不上神作，但也能算个好游戏；玩完第五章跟我朋友说，第五章剧情真的好，强烈推荐；等到第六章的时候给他发了一堆粑粑表情，哈哈[b] 太好玩辣！什么垃圾玩意儿 [/b]
6、然后讲一下人物塑造，弹丸1.2我觉得人物塑造的是很好的，起码每个人都有其存在的价值，都有他们独特的个性；但是v3给我的感觉就是除了主要的几个角色以外，其他角色全是来打酱油的，来推动剧情发展的npc，离谱。[spoiler] 从头混到尾的梦野，还有讨人厌的安琪。 [/spoiler]搞不懂这代为什么有这么多讨人厌的角色，嘻嘻。
7、最后讲一下操作方法，我不知道是不是我电脑原因，很多地方我操作之后没有反应，要按好多次才行，地图走动也很难受，完全没有1的丝滑。
幸好小高不再继续做弹丸系列了，就这部的水平，大概率再做下去就要像唐探电影一样越来越垃圾了，只能说幸好。
哦最后还有一点，v3这么贵，但是做出来这么依托的剧情，我真的觉得很不值。

author: {'steamid': '76561198312265423', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4022, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4022, 'last_played': 1705542397}
review: De lejos es el peor port de la saga, ¿Porqué tendría que googlear los controles de un juego por el que pagué? ah si, porque no pudieron simplemente poner la equivalencia de control en teclado (en los juegos anteriores si, no me explico porque en este no), la historia y los personajes fueron los más aburridos de la franquicia, uno que otro es rescatable, pero ajá, le doy crítica positiva por amor a la saga y porque se puso bueno después de 40hrs de juego xd, entendible si alguien lo dropeó antes, cuando te revelan pues que técnicamente este juego no es canon, llamemosle así, porque no aporta nada a la historia que llevamos viendo, que creo que era lo que los fans queriamos, que siguieran construyendo el tan buen universo que habian planteado en las precuelas, el spin off y en los animes, sin embargo debo admitir que si fue un muy buen plot twist y el mensaje que intentaron dar, wow, totalmente de acuerdo con el mensaje que no hay que subestimar a la ficción, muy bien implementado, no pagaría ni de pedo por su precio original xd, lo compré solo porque estaba en descuento, el soundtrack como siempre god, y las nuevas mecánicas también uwu  y los class trials ufff de verdad buenisimos, pero ¿¡porqué quitarían las mascotas en los monopads!? :/ amé la filosofia de que tanto puede ayudarnos la ficción en los problemas de la vida real, es un buen juego de danganronpa y punto, pero favor continuen la historia, gracias.

author: {'steamid': '76561199112863260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7283, 'last_played': 1710008184}
review: In my personal experience as a Danganronpa fan since 2019, this game has always been my favorite. The franchise was at it's peak in 2020. I would definitely recommend others to play this as well. (If you look at my profile and see that I have no achievements whatsoever, I swear I've played this game multiple times just on different devices. I AM NOT A PHONY.) The only problem about this game is that the ending is kind of terrible, but you'll get over it. Many trials will (or might?) make you cry. If you don't wanna get hooked on a character and see them die, I would never play this game, or any Danganronpa game to be exact. Still, if you do and your favorite ends up surviving, then, congrats..

review:
¿Que es Danganronpa V3?
Para el ciego, es la luz.
Para el hambriento, es el pan.
Para el enfermo, es la cura.
Para el solitario, es el compañero.
Para el triste, es la alegría.
Para el prisionero, es la libertad.
Para el pobre, es el tesoro.
Para el deudor, es el perdón.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128105089', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 3069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3042, 'last_played': 1705209010}
review:
Casi nunca escribo reseñas salvo para los juegos que de verdad siento que lo requieren.

La mayor parte del juego me encantó, todo el desarrollo, los juicios, la música, los personajes, etc.
Le doy recomendar porque el 99% del juego me parece excelente, pero el juicio final es... raro. Es inesperado y la forma en que se lleva el tema del mundo de Danganronpa es... raro. No me terminó de convencer la última parte del juego.

Entiendo la idea de cómo quisieron abordar lo del mundo del juego y el tema de los personajes y sus trasfondos pero no sé, no me encantó. Sin embargo, muy probablemente yo no lo habría hecho mejor.

Aún así es un gran juego que da cierre a esta gran saga que es Danganronpa, sin duda debe ser jugado (recomiendo ampliamente jugar Trigger Happy Havoc y Goodbye Despair antes de este, ya que hay algunas cosas que se entienden mejor si lo has jugado.)

9/10 por ese final abrupto y totalmente inesperado, le dieron la vuelta en un segundo a las 40 horas de desarrollo anteriores.

Himiko best girl.

author: {'steamid': '76561198275484313', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3255, 'last_played': 1703956930}
review:
[h3] Mais uma experiência recheada de desespero [/h3]

O [b] visual [/b] desse jogo tá simplesmente maravilhoso, foi uma grande evolução comparando com os jogos anteriores. A [b] gameplay [/b] também teve uma melhora absurda na minha opinião. Mecânicas mais interessantes e minigames bem melhores. [strike] Só não curti o sistema de cassino [/strike]

Achei que em alguns trials foram mais previsíveis que em jogos anteriores, mas continua sendo uma ótima experiência. Personagens seguem sendo carismáticos e talvez até mais interessantes

Minha única ressalva foi o final, que em minha opinião, foi bastante anticlimático. Mas isso definitivamente não invalida o restante do jogo, que afinal, estamos falando de Danganronpa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198877971413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1705112253}
review: I love everything about the Danganronpa series and would 100% recommend. It's a detective game and each one has unique endings and unexpected happenings that keep you thinking the entire game, and it isn't a short one, which I personally like.

author: {'steamid': '76561199237774607', 'num_games_owned': 900, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1705090917}
review:
早就听闻弹丸3结局恶心人，也看到不少人骂编剧，本着没有调查就没有发言权的精神玩了一下，刚打完第一个案子就被恶心到了，给我一种为刀而刀的感觉，还有自以为巧妙，实则恶心人的感觉，[spoiler]凶手是我自己，真是令人震惊！[/spoiler]。打完后直接搜了后面的剧透，[spoiler]凶手实际不是女主[/spoiler]，更恶心了。

那几个五彩熊比绝对绝望少女的五彩小孩还烦，废话多得很，bgm也很难听，出场退场还要叫两声。

小高和刚就是个傻逼，不想写可以拿铅球给自己爆个头，这样就再也不用写了，真以为自己剧情写得多好，我能玩下去完全是因为画风和演出。

以上为5.8小时测评，刚打完第一个案子。

author: {'steamid': '76561198829417320', 'num_games_owned': 416, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 4694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4694, 'last_played': 1704844360}
review:
[b]Игра весьма неоднозначная из за своего финала и даже существования так как необходимости особой в ней нету. Сразу хочу отметить плохое техническое состояние как в самой игре время от времени клавиатура перестает работать на некоторое время. Также при сохранении и загрузке происходит непонятная задержка.[/b]
[h1]Сюжет.[/h1] Он тут одноразовый и при повторном прохождении и знании финала я начал видеть очень много ошибок сценария. Сами события в первый раз вызывают интерес да и что уж там некоторые сцены вызвали эмоции и при втором прохождении. Но вот только довольно быстро становится все равно, а после концовки и вовсе игра стирается из памяти. И такого нету при прохождении второй части или же серии Zero Escape от тех же разработчиков. Я хорошо запомнил те игры, а тут я даже первый суд не особо хорошо запомнил как и большинство событий данной игры.
[h1]Персонажи.[/h1] Кокичи получился лучше всех он наиболее интересный герои но это связано с тем что он наиболее активный и неясно он хороший или плохой. Остальные герои в большинстве своем получились неплохо. Но вот все равно до уровня героев второй части они не дотянули. И если сравнивать каждую игру то тут персонажи почти не бесят но и запоминаются они не особо хорошо.
[h1]Первый Суд.[/h1] Хоть он и вызвал много эмоций сам по себе он очень глупый. Особенно при повторном прохождении когда видишь многие ошибки которые допущены специально. Как минимум отсутствием Хендбука у трупа хотя фотографией на которой данный предмет есть светят довольно часто и ни один герои даже не задался этим вопросом. И конечно смена персонажа хоть и неожиданна но можно сказать логична. Ведь Каэда как герои изначально практически идеальная и развивать ее больше некуда. Хотя конечно варианты были в том числе и главного злодея из нее сделать но это уже мои идеи. Но даже та идея которая здесь не работает так как после первого суда все можно сказать забыли обо всем что происходило до финала. Хотя задумка вроде в том что бы именно это первое дело имело отклик во всех остальных и главный герои частенько вспоминал о героине. Но видимо только не в этой игре.
[h1]Финал.[/h1] Нельзя не сказать и о нем. Если цель была вызвать любые эмоции то разработчики справились. Вот только игра от этого хода пострадала очень сильно став одноразовым продуктом. Ведь если все это выдумка даже для героев игры и все события абсолютно не важны то какое дело игроку до этого. Вспоминая последнюю часть Zero Escape где многие концовки были сделаны довольно хорошо, были довольно важными и связаны с другими играми серии. А сам финал был крайне интересным и очень хорошо рассказывал зачем все это нужно было. И все это не портило последующие прохождения. То в этой игре концовка обесценила итоги всех глав и сделала повторное прохождение не особо увлекательным так как все что здесь происходит не важно.
[b]В итоге на один раз по большой скидке можно купить. Но стоит учитывать что игра может сильно разочаровать.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198035007897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 7610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7610, 'last_played': 1688903433}
review:
A japanese visual novel as anime as humanly possible, topped with ridiculous characters, ridiculous behavior and several murder mysteries. Be aware that in order to appreciate this title you need to be deep down the anime rabbithole and/or enjoy the western style meme potential that arises from japanese approaches of entertainment. Or if you are a weirdo like me, you use this game as a language learning resource. Be careful if you are the latter, as the characters routinely speak in heavy accent and in a quite rude manner, although out of all the DR games this one is the best for that purpose.

Story wise this is a fair contender of the Dangan Ronpa series, although I would concede to find Dangan Ronpa 2 stronger on the character side. Nevertheless, the happenings though sometimes predictable have a knack for deceiving the audience on some plot points. A caveat here is a truly hit or miss ending that may leave you in complete apathy, tears, laughter or anything in between.

Gameplay wise the series returns with a stupendous amount of text containing overexplanation, cheesy content that can only be described as animu and overreactions left right and center. As is the case with many japanese visual novels, you wade through a great amount of dialogue to get to the actual murder happenings and the following trials. Said trials go through the murder mysteries in great, dare I say overbearing detail. You will be surprised to find that a failure to account for a piece of gum under the counter is enough for incrimination as the actual murderer here. Not as much however as you will be about the small number of completely unnecessary downright ridiculous minigame "enhancements" the 500 IQ devs of the Dangan Ronpa series have come up after their murder of the question -> answer multiple choice format. Said minigames can instill feelings in any order of confusion, disbelief, amusement and annoyance.

Lastly to be said, a great amount of the tension in the game is less about the atmosphere, which is decent, and more about the uncertainty whether or not *your* favorite tipsy goofball is next on the chopping block. A good emphasis is on the likability / dislikability of characters and the player wanting them to survive and/or kick the bucket already.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118053906', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 6227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6227, 'last_played': 1704798916}
review:
I love the ideas the game challenges... Hope and Despair, Truth and Lies, Reality and Fiction... and how, in many ways, they are not just a yin and yang that must balance each other, or require each other to exist, but that they are all a false dichotomy. Beautiful ideas.

I liked the cast, but I also feel like it's the weakest cast. Though, in my opinion, some of the most fun cases.

That doesn't automatically mean I like what they did with the ending though. I like a lot of things about it, and I like the message it conveys and the takeaway, but it's easily the weakest narratively, and I also hate how I feel criticized for even feeling this way about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259733144', 'num_games_owned': 1481, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3449, 'last_played': 1704517696}
review:
I just played all of the Danganronpa games currently and i'd say that....i wish they had made DR4,I really love the characters in here Way more than other Games(Kaito,Ryoma,Himiko,Maki Even Kokichi is Well writen character),They added Extra mechanics and gamemodes compare to 1-2 aswell(Casino,Hotel,Board game,Same Post game content) There are way more stuff to say the least,The gameplay is SOOOO good compare to 1 and 2,i wish another game had similar gameplay like V3 did,The problem is that as everyone complains it....the ending,i also thought the ending was a disappointment but i understand why they had to do it,Both The company and Danganronpa fans can be obnoxious most of the time,This is basically a tombstone of why you should Let people cook the game properly instead of pestering it,Its kinda impossible to get another game since the creators of danganronpa left spike chunsoft and Cooperated with Zero escape creators,I still think this game is amazing gameplay and story wise(until the end),i wish they had made more but i respect what they had done,If i would Rank all of the series,it would just go out like....

Story Wise:3(without ending)>2>Udg>1>3(With ending)

Gameplay wise:3>2>1>Udg

Soundtrack wise:3>2>1>Udg

Overall score would be 7.5/10
If the ending was good enough,i'd make it 9/10 and probably be in top 10 of my favourites

Even though i hated the ending at the start,it felt better later on even though it gave me a bitter taste of wanting more danganronpa games like V3(Gameplay Wise)

review: Honestly, just play up to the end of Chapter 5 and don't complete chapter 6. it just isn't worth it. I didn't find myself getting as attached to the characters as I did in Danganronpa 2, but I highly enjoyed all of the trials (minus chapter 6, of course). The 5th trial in particular was my favorite of the entire series I think. But please, if you don't want to ruin the entire series for yourself, skip chapter 6, you'll enjoy all of Danganronpa more if you do.

author: {'steamid': '76561199049803564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3337, 'last_played': 1709080048}
review:
Mientras más fan feas de Danganronpa, más vas a sentir el final.
Cuando estaba en mi etapa de full enloquecida con el juego, me habían tirando spoilers que en el V3 decían que todo era ficción y Danganronpa no era más que un show, lo cual eso me decepcionó en el momento e hizo que no quisiera ver ni probar el V3, con el tiempo me tragué mis palabras y pensé "que tan malo puede ser".
Absolutamente terminé amando el final y me pareció el mas adecuado, va mucho más de "Danganronpa siendo ficción" realmente me sentí muy tocada y estoy muy pero muy satisfecha con el final, y no solo eso, el gameplay, diseño y TODO del V3 me fascinó. Lo recomiendo mucho si sos un fanático de esta bella saga 💞

review:
第3部相较于前两作新增了几个小游戏，如果时使用手柄的话会好很多，想我用键鼠就要费一点脑力，故事整体走向与前两部差不多，剧情和人物塑造相比前两部有优有劣，我喜欢枫结果第一章就无了，我喜欢东条结果第二章就无了，我喜欢春川但是剧情里她却喜欢百田，还剩个白银，结果还是幕后黑手，挺难受的，但也是剧情精彩的一部分，但有一些地方处理的还不够好就是
这游戏能举办到53届，未来机关都在吃干饭吗？

qué acabo de jugar.
